Package com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastMessageAction
    The BroadcastMessageAction is used to present BroadcastMessages in a view.
    CheckAction
    The Class CheckAction is used by GuiCheckController for performing a check.
    CheckCapabilitiesImpl
    The CheckCapabilitiesImpl is the default implementation of CheckCapabilities.
    CheckExceptionHandler
    The Class CheckExceptionHandler is used to handle Exceptions caused by CheckAdapter.check(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings.CheckSettings, com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction.CheckInformation, com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings.DocumentCheckSettings) .
    CheckingKeywordDialogAction
    The CheckingKeywordDialogAction displays the keyword dialog.
    CheckingOptionDialogCallback
    The Class CheckingOptionDialogCallback is checking on CheckingOptionDialogCallback.dialogClosed(ClientSettings) and canceling callback on CheckingOptionDialogCallback.onCancel().
    ComparativeCheckAction
    The ComparativeCheckAction uses the SessionHistory.isShouldBeComparativeChecked(FileName) with its CheckAcceptenceStrategy if a check should be performed.
    CorrectionDialogCheckingCheckCallback
    The class CorrectionDialogCheckingCheckCallback is used to open a corrections dialog after a check has been performed.
    GuiCheckControllerActionFactory
    The Class GuiCheckControllerActionFactory is used to create actions working with GuiCheckController.
    GuiCheckControllerActionFactoryFactory
    The Class GuiCheckControllerActionFactoryFactory is used to create a GuiCheckControllerActionFactory.
    InlineCheckingCheckCallback
    The Class InlineCheckingCheckCallback is a CheckCallback which maps to a InlineCheckingCheckCallback.
    OptionDialogCallbackCollection
    The OptionDialogCallbackCollection is used to manage a collection of OptionDialogCallbacks.
    PresentOptionsAction
    The Class PresentOptionsAction presents the option view depending on ShowOptionsStrategy and calls OptionDialogCallback.
    StoringAndCheckingKeywordDialogCallback
    The StoringAndCheckingKeywordDialogCallback stores the DocumentCheckSettings and runs the check action on KeyWordsDialogCallback.dialogClosed(KeyWordsModel).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CheckExceptionHandler.FailureHandling
    The enum CheckExceptionHandler.FailureHandling is used to define how an exception while checking should be handled.
